articles.title: Ratan Tata: The 'modest' Indian tycoon who died at 86 - BBC.com
articles.description: The businessman led a conglomerate of more than 100 companies, employing some 660,000 people.
articles.content:
Tata led a "salt-to-software" conglomerate of more than 100 companies
Ratan Tata, who has died aged 86, was one of India's most internationally recognised business leaders.
The tycoon led the Tata … [+6261 chars]
